--- ### @mixin flexbox Style only when browser supports flexbox. #### Arguments | Name | Type | Default | Description | | ---- | ---- | ------- | ----------- | | `horizontal` | `string` | `$flexbox-horizontal` | Flex when viewport reached this amount | | `vertical` | `string` | `$flexbox-vertical` | Flex when viewport reached this amount | #### Dependencies For flexbox to work properly it uses Modernizr `.flexbox` and `.flexboxlegacy` #### SCSS {% highlight css %} .foo { @include flexbox($beta, $charlie) { display: flex; } } {% endhighlight %} #### SCSS {% highlight css %} @media (min-width: 560px) and (min-height: 768px) { .flexbox .foo, .flexboxlegacy .foo { display: flex; } } {% endhighlight %}
